dcterms:description: A large-scale, multimodal, multilabel benchmark archive for remote sensing image classification and retrieval, containing 590,326 multi-modal image pairs, each consisting of one Sentinel-1 SAR image and one Sentinel-2 multispectral image acquired on the same geographical area.
dcterms:title: BigEarthNet
